org.elasticsearch.test.rest.client.http

Class HttpRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.test.rest.client.http.HttpRequestBuilder

  • public class HttpRequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Executable builder for an http request Holds an HttpClient that is used to send the built http request

      • path

        public HttpRequestBuilder path(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the path to send the request to. Url encoding needs to be applied by the caller. Use pathParts(String...) instead if the path needs to be encoded, part by part.

      • pathParts

        public HttpRequestBuilder pathParts(java.lang.String... path)
        Sets the path by providing the different parts (without slashes), which will be properly encoded.
